name: Magnet's Strange Adventure
description:
Music is by Kevin Macleod

This is another game entry for an object camp. This one is the first challenge of BFCD Season 5.

For context: The challenge was to free poorly drawn spiderman (the host) from his snowed over house.

CONTROLS:

A and D to move left and right

Space to jump

Escape to quickly restart the game (for speedruns)
